location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Charles Edwards, Bushire to Captain H Atkinson, British India Steam Navigation Company's Steam Ship Euphrates

physicalDescription.extent: This letter is an enclosure to the letter on folios 96-97.

mods.abstract: Letter thanking the Captain for his explanations with regards to the runaway slaves and Goolam Ali [Ghulam 'Ali].A postscript to the letter returns the articles of agreement for crew, an order for 40 tons of coal which he can collect at Bassidore and requesting that he deliver a packet to Colonel Lewis Pelly's address either at Bunder Abbass [Bandar Abbas] or Muskat [Muscat].
